name: Master Jump - Bounce-down Jumpyline and Stickman Ninjump Deluxe
name_original: Master Jump - Bounce-down Jumpyline and Stickman Ninjump Deluxe
description:
Master Jump is real fun, challenging and addictive game on App Store!

Get ready to blast off on an epic jumping journey with Master Jump!

Super easy to play this jumping game; let’s start happy jump together. You have to just jump forward. There are two simple rules. Tap to jump a little height and hold to jump a bit higher.
There are spikes in your way. Never crash with the spikes or its game over! When you see any spikes in front of you, tap to jump over it. Another important thing is, make sure you are in the road bars. Don’t fall down!
12 different levels are added in this game. Clear level one and level two will be unlocked. Clear level two, level three will be unlocked and so on.. Take bounce energy and start jumping!

Exciting Master Jump Game Features:
-Easy to control
-Need just tapping
-Realistic sounds
-Stunning graphics
-12 different jumpy levels
- Exciting collectables snow flakes for exciting power ups

Don't be late! Download this game right now! Be the jump-start jumping HERO!
Download now! Have fun! Let’s enjoy this jumpy mega jump scare game!
